reviewText: The course contains a lot of memorization and little understanding. It is different from the previous course, SE220, which was much easier.
Data structure course is one of the best courses I ever took. The material is very interesting and fun.
Computer organization course is very heavy but easy at the same time. Covers number systems and assembly basics.
I took 453 with Dr. Hadeel. It's very easy, you just need to have a good understanding. I consider it an A+ subject. For me, I find it same as 316 course
Very easy course if you like watching Turkish saries you won't find it difficult at all
Very easy course, and the instructor is kind & helpful
Very easy course, and the instructor is kind & helpful
This course is very important for the next software courses. Dr.Taher makes it very easy and simpler than it already is.
